Author: bluberry7
Title: [MIND] MINDSPORTS - Trusted Boardgame Network
Body: I was reading the article but still, can you please describe the concept in a few simple phrases? It would be very useful.

Author: mindsports
Title: [MIND] MINDSPORTS - Trusted Boardgame Network
Body: Hi Bluebuerry,  Hope this helps!  MindSports IO is a decentralized platform where people can play and host online rated board games for instant rewards, and decide about the future of the platform.  How it works •   1. Host creates tournament, using smart contracts to create transparent rules and token payouts •   2. Players agree to the rules and deposit MIND tokens into the secure platform •   3. Game is played and won, as determined by the rules of the smart contract.    Network pays host for hosting    Network pays winner for winning    All others are rewarded according to the smart contract •   Govern: Token holders are part of the voting governance community to settle game disputes and get rewarded with MIND. •   Grow: Be part of the MIND Registry to propose and vote for the mind games that the community would like MindSports IO team build and deploy to the network.

By subscribing to the token pre-sale on Nov 17th, 2017, you are eligible for a 50% token bonus compared to the actual crowdsale.  Sign up Here For Our Token Pre-Sale Starting in 5 Days!

Title: [MIND] MINDSPORTS - Trusted Boardgame Network
Body: There is a similar project Dmarket raising funds right now. How do you compete to them?

Title: [MIND] MINDSPORTS - Trusted Boardgame Network
Body: Would I be able to invest with my BTC?

Author: lysr
Title: [MIND] MINDSPORTS - Trusted Boardgame Network
Body: How will you overcome the difficulty of obtaining the MIND tokens by the actual users(chess players) of your platform who are likely not having any experience in cryptocurrencies?

Author: mindsports
Title: [MIND] MINDSPORTS - Trusted Boardgame Network
Body: Hi bear, Dmarket is a great platform and I would encourage you to look into them. They are providing a marketplace for digital gaming assets. However, we are not competing with them. Mindsports IO is a decentralized social gaming network where token holders can create , play , and govern intellectual games such as Chess, Go and Checkers. We are a team of mind sports and blockchain enthusiasts  who are committed to building up a community within the intellectual games and boardgames space. Feel free to learn more about us on our website or Whitepaper.

Author: mindsports
Title: [MIND] MINDSPORTS - Trusted Boardgame Network
Body: Hi lysr,  We only accept ETH for now, but the team is exploring ways to accept BTC.   Quote from: lysr on November 12, 2017, 01:52:05 PM How will you overcome the difficulty of obtaining the MIND tokens by the actual users(chess players) of your platform who are likely not having any experience in cryptocurrencies?  In terms of offline to online market penetration, we plan to partner up with local organizations to host and sponsor mind sports tournaments. Winners will be rewarded with MIND tokens which they can use on our MindSports IO. We will also allocate 10,000 Unsold MIND Token as airdrop and distribute 10 MIND each to the top 1,000 mind sports professional in Chess, Go, Chinese Chess and Shogi.   Our passionate team and advisors consist of key executives and directors in prominent associations such as the World Chess Federation (FIDE) and the International Mind Sports Association (IMSA), chess grandmasters, and various global mind sports professionals. After speaking with many users and listening to their concerns with current platforms, we are confident getting users with minimal cryptocurrencies experience into the decentralized MindSports IO network once we go live in 2Q18.

Author: mindsports
Title: [MIND] MINDSPORTS - Trusted Boardgame Network
Body: And the Winner Is …  The winners of MindSports IOs writing contest has been announced. Congratulations Michellerhey! We especially enjoyed reading submissions where people linked their previous experiences with intellectual sports and gaming to MindSports IO.  1st Place — Can the Blockchain Bring Fairness and Transparency to Competitive Mindsports? (michellerhey) 2nd Place — MindSports IO a Steam Like Boardgame Platform (kimzwarch) 3rd Place — Decentralized Mindsports Network Based on The Ethereum Blockchain (outerground) 4th Place —  MindSports IO: Decentralizing Intelligent Game Play (mooncryption) 5th Place —  Get Rewarded for Hosting and Playing Games at MindSports IO (steveconnoc)  The contest had 20 entries within the period of 72 hours. We congratulate all of the finalists. Thank you all for your participation and we can’t wait for MindSports IO to go live and invite all of you to create, play, and govern rated intellectual games within our network.  5 days left until our token pre-sale! Register Here. Token Pre-Sale starts on November 17, 2017, at 02:00 PM (UTC). First 24 Hours +50% Bonus Day 2 +25% Bonus Day 3 +10% Bonus Day 4 + 5% Bonus

PLEASE NOTE To participate in the token presale on Nov 17, 2017 2PM (UTC), we require everybody to register to our whitelist.  ONLY contribute when the MIND presale is announced on this channel and on our website. We will NEVER ask you for ETH via email or Telegram messages.  ONLY use these listed sources for accurate information and updates  Mindsports IO website: https://www.mindsports.io Twitter: https://twitter.com/mindsportsio Medium Blog: https://medium.com/mindsportsio  Consider any information coming from other unknown sources to be untrustworthy, false, or worse a phishing or scam attempt.

Author: mindsports
Title: [MIND] MINDSPORTS - Trusted Boardgame Network
Body: MindSports IO Live-Stream Demo Invitation Tournament.  On November 17th, 2017 from 11:00 AM — 3:00 PM (UTC), we will invite prominent professionals from both Chess and Xiangqi community to test and play on our network. The event will be streamed live on Youtube where viewers can watch world chinese chess champion (non asian) Island Kon compete. Other participants include International Grand Master, Chiu Yu Kuen and IM Vincent Wong.  The Game Schedule Will Be Announced Shortly.  Demo Game Release — MindSports IO With only two days left until our MIND token pre-sale. We are excited to announce the release of MindSports IO network demo.  Throughout the past 3 weeks, we tested our demos on the ropsten network. Our Chess and XiangQi (Chinese Chess) demo are ready and are functioning within the network. With the demos, players deposit their tokens in the specific ETH address before the game starts and the tokens will be distributed to the winner after game results have been declared.  Whats Next? Alpha Tester Invitation We will be launching our alpha version in December 2017 and would like to invite selected participants who have contributed to our pre-sale to test and play mind games on the network. Mark it down on your calendar!

Author: mindsports
Title: [MIND] MINDSPORTS - Trusted Boardgame Network
Body: Hi Everyone, we are currently at the Digital Asset and Blockchain Congress in Shenzhen to spread our mission at MindSports IO.  Please see below for questions raised in the previous post.  Feel free to read our FAQ here      We will announce our official crowdsale shortly after our pre-sale on Nov 17th,2017 2PM (UTC)  Quote from: zyvervago on November 08, 2017, 05:24:59 PM There are some big monsters in chess industry like chess.com, chess24.com, playchess, ICC and liches.org (which is totally free). How do you plan to compete with them?   Great question! Chess is only ONE of the intellectual games that we will be introducing into the network. The MindSports IO network will introduce a larger variety of intellectual games than any traditional online platform. Every six months, token holders propose and vote for their favorite game to be built and deployed next on the network. Four games are expected to be rolled out by 2019.  The MindSports IO platform is free to sign up, free to try. We will introduce a practice/demo option for users to be more familiar with the platform. However, MIND token will be required in order to participate our key features of the decentralized gaming network such as hosting tournaments, challenging players for tokens, and being part of the voting and network governance community.  I have attached a comparison below to point out how we differ from traditional chess platforms. For Chess itself, there are 600 million players globally, last time we checked, Chess.com has around 5 million players and claims to be the largest online platform for chess which means there is tremendous opportunity for us to grow and capture the market.      Our passionate team and advisors consist of key executives and directors in prominent associations such as the World Chess Federation (FIDE) and the International Mind Sports Association (IMSA), blockchain experts, crypto investors, chess grandmasters, and various global mind sports professionals.  Quote from: Valya_87 on November 08, 2017, 07:13:24 PM what happens with the remaining tokens after pre-ico and ico? In order to raise awareness of MindSports IO Network, we will allocate 10,000 Unsold MIND Token as airdrop and distribute 10 MIND each to the top 1,000 mind sports professional in Chess, Go, Chinese Chess, Shogi. Remaining MIND token will be burned.  Quote from: Danil_k on November 08, 2017, 08:35:54 PM can I participate in bounty if im currently in US?  Yes people in the US are able to participate in the bounty. However, please note that If you are in the US, only Citizens or residents of United States who are accredited investors may participate in this Token Sale.  Quote from: holua1 on November 08, 2017, 10:05:31 PM can I join the pre-sale or its already closed?  You can register here Pre-sale will commence Nov 17th, 2017 2PM (UTC) and ends Dec 16th, 2017 2PM(UTC).   There will be a limited supply of 15,000,000 MIND Tokens available for the Pre-sale. So make sure you register first and mark it down on your calendar.  First 24 Hours +50% Bonus Tokens Day 2  +25% Bonus   Day 3  +10% Bonus Day 4  +  5% Bonus   Quote from: splinterMAGIC on November 08, 2017, 08:37:47 PM where is the coin address declimas symbol??  Our Token symbol is MIND. The token address link will be on our website on the day of the pre-sale. Please feel free to check out our github depository for the smart contract https://github.com/mindsports/MIND/tree/master/contract   Quote from: bitmaster1209 on November 08, 2017, 11:33:46 PM what price do you expect when the trading starts?  The Price is expected to be 1 ETH = 1,000 MIND Token or 0.001 ETH for 1 MIND Token  Keep throwing us more questions! Happy to answer them

Please see below for our deliverables:  With 2,000 ETH •   Fund 3 engineers and 1 UX designer for 1 year •   MindSports.IO supports Chess •   Decentralized Tournament Hosting, Voting Governance   With 5,000 ETH •   Fund 5 engineers, 1 UX designer for 1 year •   Based on network governance results, roll out new Mind Games every 3-6 months •   Decentralized Tournament Hosting, Voting Governance  With 10,000 ETH •   Fund 5 engineers, 1 UX designer, 1 marketer for 2 years •   Based on voting results, roll out new Mind Game every 3-6 months •   International Mind Sports Event Sponsorship  With 25,000 ETH •   Fund 8 engineers, 2 UX designers, 1 marketers for 3 years •   Research and build Plasma Integration Prototype •   Regional Mind Sports Events Sponsorship  With 30,000 ETH (Hard Cap) •   Fund 10 engineers, 2 UX designers, 2 marketers for 3 years •   Research and build Plasma Integration Prototype •   International Mind Sports Events Sponsorship

Author: zatoshi
Title: [MIND] MINDSPORTS - Trusted Boardgame Network
Body: This project looks interesting... I just would like to learn more about your competitors:  1) Who are them? 2) What are you doing differently  Also, please let me know... it is a platform to host tournements, in which players play a fee to participate, and the winners receive the prizes based on the fees paid? There is also a bet contract?  Thanks

Author: stasik201330
Title: [MIND] MINDSPORTS - Trusted Boardgame Network
Body: Hello, I read through the whitepaper. It would appear this is a utility token and there is no mining. Could someone confirm?

Author: mindsports
Title: [MIND] MINDSPORTS - Trusted Boardgame Network
Body: Hi Zatoshi,  This question was raised earlier, please see below for more details. Happy to provide more details if required.   MindSports IO network will introduce a larger variety of intellectual games than any traditional online platform. Every six months, token holders propose and vote for their favorite game to be built and deployed next on the network. Four games are expected to be rolled out by 2019.  The MindSports IO platform is free to sign up, free to try. We will introduce a practice/demo option for users to be more familiar with the platform. However, MIND token will be required in order to participate our key features of the decentralized gaming network such as hosting tournaments, challenging players for tokens, and being part of the voting and network governance community. The payout from tournaments will be determined by the tournment host using smart contracts.  I have attached a comparison below to point out how we differ from traditional chess platforms. For Chess itself, there are 600 million players globally, last time we checked, Chess.com has around 5 million players and claims to be the largest online platform for chess which means there is tremendous opportunity for us to grow and capture the market.     Quote from: stasik201330 on November 09, 2017, 07:02:37 PM Hello, I read through the whitepaper. It would appear this is a utility token and there is no mining. Could someone confirm?  Hi Stasik,  You are correct MIND is a utility token and no mining is required. We have a limited supply of 50,000,000 MIND.  Unsold MIND Tokens In order to raise awareness of MindSports IO Network, we will allocate 10,000 Unsold MIND Token as airdrop and distribute 10 MIND each to the top 1,000 mind sports professional in Chess, Go, Chinese Chess, Shogi. Remaining MIND token will be burned.

Author: mindsports
Title: [MIND] MINDSPORTS - Trusted Boardgame Network
Body: MindSports IO Pre-Sale Changed to Nov 17, 2017 2 pm (UTC)  Click Here to Register  Hey MIND Supporters,  We have just arrived in Asia after our San Francisco roadshow. This month has been very exciting for us. We received lots of positive feedbacks and applause for how we are using blockchain technology on building the gaming network. After extensive considerations by the team and advisor, we decided to change the date of pre-sale from Nov 9 to Nov 17, 2017, 14:00 (UTC) We believe that this update to our roadmap is the best interest for all our pre-sale contributors and early adopters. In terms of game revision, we will put poker on hold as we believe there are many platforms in the market that provides such game. Instead, we are focused on building intellectual sports such as Chess, Draughts (Checkers), Xiangqi (Chinese Chess), Bridge, Shogi, Go and other board games. We plan to introduce various games outside of the current mind sports category in the future.     By extending the date of our contribution period, we will be doing more road shows. Here are the following events we will be attending for the coming weeks in Asia.   Nov 9 -10, 2017 Digital Asset and Blockchain Congress 2017 (Shenzhen) Nov 10, 2017 2nd Annual Blockchain Conference (Hong Kong) Nov 11, 2017 Blockchain & Cryptocurrency Conference (Tokyo) Nov 14-16, 2017 Singapore FinTech Festival 2017 (Singapore) Nov 17, 2017 MindSports IO Pre-Sale Launch  New Advisors On Board We would like to welcome our new advisors on board.  Min Kim - [Suspicious link removed]munityunity Advisor, Ex-Tim Draper Matt Quinn - Ethereum Community Advisor, Ex-Apple Zeev Kirsh - Legal Advisor, Ex- Paul Weiss, JD at Columbia University School of Law  We will be showcasing our working demo to the public prior to the pre-sale. Stay tuned for upcoming exciting announcements. As usual, feel free to contact us during this whole process.

Author: mindsports
Title: [MIND] MINDSPORTS - Trusted Boardgame Network
Body: Upcoming Announcement: Pre-Sale in 10 Days! Nov 9, 2017 2PM(UTC)  Hey MIND Supporters,  Firstly, my team and I would like to thank you all for the support and interest in building the first decentralized social gaming network. MIND tokens will allow people to create, play and govern our upcoming intellectual games such as Chess, Go, Poker, and many more.  We have an exciting announcement to make in the coming days. As a result, our Pre-Sale will be pushed back one week from the original Nov 2 2017 to Nov 9, 2017, 02:00PM (UTC)  Make sure you mark it down your calendar if you don’t want to miss out our 50% Bonus. Available only for the first 24 hrs!  Register Here  It has been an eventful week for us from participating in the First Ethereal Hackathon to speaking with various prominent figures in the blockchain, and crypto community.   We definitely feel the vibrant blockchain energy in San Francisco and is very optimistic about the future of the technology   Please be aware not to deposit into any ETH address prior to the launch date.   We will be announcing our official address ONLY on our Website and Telegram.   In case you haven’t done it, check out our Bounty Thread to see how you can participate and get rewarded in MIND Tokens for spreading the good news.   Stay Tuned!

Author: mindsports
Title: [MIND] MINDSPORTS - Trusted Boardgame Network
Body: MindSports IO –The Most Intelligent and Trusted Board Game Network    About Us Powered by smart contracts and the Ethereum blockchain, our intelligent and trusted platform allows users to create, play and vote online rated intellectual games such as Chess, Draughts (Checkers), Xiangqi, Bridge and Go. The MindSports IO network will introduce a larger variety of intellectual games than any traditional online platform. Every six months, token holders propose and vote for their favorite game to be built and deployed next on the network. Four games are expected to be rolled out by 2019.  Our passionate team and advisors consist of key executives and directors in prominent associations such as the World Chess Federation (FIDE) and the International Mind Sports Association (IMSA), blockchain experts, crypto investors, chess grandmasters, and various global mind sports professionals.    TOKEN SALE OVER! THANK YOU ALL!  View Campaign Here!  Join our Telegram Channel to Chat with Us. WHITEPAPER | TWITTER | WEBSITE | GITHUB | MEDIUM      MindSports IO DApps Consist of 4 Main Components  1.HTML5 Front End Client  2.IPFS as a Decentralized Storage Layer  3.Smart Contract as Decentralized Logic Layer  4.Whisper as the Messaging Layer    Anti-Cheating Layers  1. Intelligent Reputation Layer Red flag potential cheaters based on player’s behavior and features like playing habits, game metrics, like time per move, rating and reputation change. Users can also stake their tokens to interact with our Reputation Engine by providing relevant metrics, indicator to help us improve our anti-cheating algorithm, to identify cheaters and get token reward accordingly.  2. Statistical Analysis Layer Infer and calculate move-matching probability between chess engine and human players to identify potential chess engine gameplay manipulation.  3. Community Layer Act as arbiter in case of dispute, where token holders can vote to resolve dispute and get rewarded with tokens and reputation rating when they identify cheaters.     The majority of our token proceeds will be allocated to the development of the MindSports IO platform. We would also like to highlight that a portion of the proceeds will go toward the promotion of MindSports IO tournaments. We believe this is necessary to jumpstart our platform and is also an opportunity get users to participate in the mind sports discussions and contribute to building up long-term value for the MIND Token.    Project Roadmap and Deliverables  Phase 1 Concept and Prototype Development Identified current problems in the mind sports landscape and addressed the issue by applying Ethereum technology to build MindSports IO prototype and whitepaper.  Phase 2 Alpha Testing Prototype release allows users to play Chess on our demo during the pre-sale. Token Holders can vote in Dec 2017 and decide the next mind games to be deployed next.  Phase 3 Beta Testing The initial release of MindSports IO. This beta release allows the community to beta test our platform’s features and plays Chess with MIND Token.  Phase 4 Official Release The first production release of MindSports IO. Include Chess DApp release in Apr 2018 and second game release in Jun 2018.  Phase 5 Features Expansion The next phase of MindSports IO is intended to provide a better gaming experience and API support for developers to design and deployment.  Phase 6 Plasma Integration With plasma integration, moves verification can be done on-chain and more complex games can be introduced and deployed to MindSports IO Network.           Partnership   Bounties  We offer bounties for Twitter, Signature campaign and Avatar, ANN Translation, Blog, Articles and Media campaign bounty.  Please visit this link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2275109.0  Airdrop (CLOSED) Token Price: 1 ETH = 1,000 MIND Token Join Both Our Telegram and Twitter To Participate Telegram Twitter Join both and we will send you 10 MIND Token! Tell your friends! (LIMITED FIRST 1,000) Register Here The airdrop will be distributed on your Ethereum address after the crowdsale in 30 days You can monitor statistics here:  ANN Threads in Other Languages Indonesian Translation Dutch Translation Polish Translation Portuguese Translation  Whitepaper in Other Languages Chinese Translation   TELEGRAM - Chat with Us Here WHITEPAPER | TWITTER | WEBSITE |GITHUB| MEDIUM  Press and Media   MindSports IO To Revolutionize Intellectual Sports for 1 Billion Players (Coin Telegraph) Experty Partners With MindSports IO to Provide Users with Expert Advice and Lessons on Various Mind Sports (Coinwire) MindSports IO Intro Video (Youtube)
